text:
Company: Ferguson and Sons

Role: Waterfront Facilities Engineer

Company Background:
Ferguson and Sons is a premier engineering firm specializing in waterfront developments and marine infrastructure. We are committed to excellence and innovation in every project we undertake.

Job Description:
We are seeking talented women to fill the vacancy of Waterfront Facilities Engineer. In this role, you will be responsible for overseeing the design, construction, and maintenance of waterfront structures. This position is part of our initiative to hire more women, aiming to achieve gender parity and promote diversity within our team.

Responsibilities:
- Design and develop waterfront facilities, including docks, piers, and marinas.
- Oversee construction projects from inception to completion.
- Conduct regular inspections and maintenance of existing structures.
- Collaborate with clients, contractors, and regulatory bodies to ensure project compliance.
- Provide technical support and guidance to team members.

Qualifications and Experience:
- Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering or a related field.
- Professional Engineer (PE) license preferred.
- Minimum of 5 years of experience in waterfront or marine engineering.
- Strong project management and leadership skills.
- Excellent communication and collaborative abilities.

Perks and Benefits:
- Competitive salary ranging from $70,000 to $95,000 annually, based on experience and skills.
- Comprehensive health insurance, including dental and vision coverage.
- Generous paid time off and holiday schedule.
- Opportunities for professional development and career growth.
- Supportive and inclusive work environment.

Ferguson and Sons is committed to providing opportunities for women in our industry. Women are especially encouraged to apply for this position.
